name: jlu
description: A extension to keep your json langs up to date

jlu.langFolderName.description: Lang folder name, the extension will only work under this folder

jlu.autoSave.description: Save the targets files and close the windows. Directly overwrite, you won't be able to easily undo thoose changes

jlu.target.arrayChecking.description: Enable this option to check also arrays. (Array checking is made following the array order)

jlu.target.overwriting.description: Overwries when the properties of the saving file are diferent types to the ones of the target language files

jlu.msg.loadedMsg.description: Shows a message when the extensions is ready

jlu.msg.messaging.description: Enables all the info messages from this extension

jlu.msg.plainDifAlert.description: Shows a message when a not identified plain value on an array is detected

jlu.target.todoTxt.description: Text that will replace for the waiting translation

jlu.target.todoTxtAddIndex.description: When enabled will show the index of the array values at the target files

jlu.target.defaultOverwriteOption.description: Action to take when a target file is not a JSON

jlu.target.excludeNames.description: These files won't be targets of the extension

jlu.format.indentSpaces.description: Number of repetitions of the 'indent string' on one indent

jlu.format.indentOption.description: Indent option used for formatting the target files
